name: profanity_detect
description: Detect the profanity in the sentence, and return the sentence without the profanity.

text.description: The sentence you want to check.

name: check_phone_number
description: check if the given phone number is validate.

number.description: The phone number you want to check.

country_code.description: The country code of the phone number.

name: analyze_scan
description: This is used to retrieve the results of an existing, ongoing, or completed scan of a website.

website.description: The host name of the website you want to scan.

name: get_scan_results
description: Each scan consists of a variety of subtests, including Content Security Policy, Subresource Integrity, etc. The results of all these tests can be retrieved once the scan's state has been placed in the FINISHED state. It will return a single tests object.

id.description: Scan_id number from the scan object.

name: get_recent_scans
description: Retrieve the ten most recent scans that fall within a given score range.

score.description: The upper or lower score of the website you want.

name: get_host_history
description: Get the host history from the given url.

host_name.description: the host name you want to get.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
